metadata.description: The MADIBA GENESIS Vol I is a must own Volume in Mandelaverse as it unlocks airdrops and rewards as we continue to release Volumes in our NFT Pack. This token also acts as a Mint Pass for the MADIBA Genesis 100 which is your exclusive entry ticket into the immersive Mandelaverse Gala held on July 18th, 2022, better known as Mandela Day.
metadata.name: MADIBA GENESIS
